channel.title: Soldier's grenades.
channel.description: So I've managed to get all the achievements. But there's an exception: the one where you have to kill a soldier with his own grenade. And the problem is that, I can't get them to throw me grenades. They just shoot at me, I wait for them to throw a grenade, but they don't and instead they kill me. I don't know what to do, is there any way to make them use their grenades?

item.title: Soldier's grenades.
item.dc:creator: Joe_Freeman
item.description:
Well I made it, although I was a suicide attack. It seems like soldiers only throw grenades when they know the enemy is there but can’t see him. So hiding in inaccessible place(at least for them) like a ventilation shaft and after a while they’ll start using their grenades. Then you just pick one and run on them, and blow.
